The_One_Book_of_Rularuu.display_help: This book is said to contain the essence of the timelines that have been, are and could be. Each letter is beyond the comprehension of all but Rularuu. Nonetheless, the tiniest fragment bestows power to those who possess it. The One Book gives a 50%% reduction to debt incurred by all Supergroup members at all times.
The_One_Book_of_Rularuu.display_target_help: This book is said to contain the essence of the timelines that have been, are and could be. Each letter is beyond the comprehension of all but Rularuu. Nonetheless, the tiniest fragment bestows power to those who possess it. The One Book gives a 50%% reduction to debt incurred by all Supergroup members at all times.

The_Perfect_Eye.display_help: This is the unblinking guardian of Rularuu's cathedral. Its gaze pierces darkness and even dimensions. The Perfect Eye aids supergroup members by increasing their chances of spotting those using stealth powers.
The_Perfect_Eye.display_target_help: This is the unblinking guardian of Rularuu's cathedral. Its gaze pierces darkness and even dimensions. The Perfect Eye aids supergroup members by increasing their chances of spotting those using stealth powers.

The_True_Furnace.display_help: This is the True Furnace Rularuu used to construct his inter-dimensional factory cubes. Although it cannot be harnessed, the True Furnace radiates energy, increasing the Endurance of every Supergroup member and supplying power to all items in a base.
The_True_Furnace.display_target_help: This is the True Furnace Rularuu used to construct his inter-dimensional factory cubes. Although it cannot be harnessed, the True Furnace radiates energy, increasing the Endurance of every Supergroup member and supplying power to all items in a base.

Heart_of_a_Storm_Elemental.display_help: Not all Rularuu's treasures have physical form. Hovering here is the Heart of Daralak, a mighty brute. The Heart increases the health of all members of a Super Group.
Heart_of_a_Storm_Elemental.display_target_help: Not all Rularuu's treasures have physical form. Hovering here is the heart of Daralak, a mighty brute. The Heart increases the health of all members of a Super Group.

Anger_Monument.display_help: Carved with strange glyphs that scholars have yet to decipher, the Anger Monument radiates with evil power. When this is in your base, it gives all members a small bonus to damage. You can have up to 5 copies in your base.
Anger_Monument.display_target_help: Carved with strange glyphs that scholars have yet to decipher, the Anger Monument radiates with evil power. When this is in your base, it gives all members a small bonus to damage. You can have up to 5 copies in your base.

Torment_Monument.display_help: Said to be etched with the pain and suffering of Rularuu's victims, this stone perversely allows members to repay debt quicker. You may have up to 5 copies of this item.
Torment_Monument.display_target_help: Said to be etched with the pain and suffering of Rularuu's victims, this stone perversely allows members to repay debt quicker. You may have up to 5 copies of this item.

Crystal_of_Resilience.display_help: Harder than diamond, the Monument of Iron confers a slight resistance to certain mind-affecting powers. You can have up to 5 copies of this item.
Crystal_of_Resilience.display_target_help: Harder than diamond, the Monument of Iron confers a slight resistance to certain mind-affecting powers. You can have up to 5 copies of this item.

Fury_Monument.display_help: This item of power has been imbued with the fury of Rularuu's ambition. This power actually gives a small bonus to experience earned for all Supergroup members. You can have up to 5 copies of this item.
Fury_Monument.display_target_help: This item of power has been imbued with the fury of Rularuu's ambition. This power actually gives a small bonus to experience earned for all Supergroup members. You can have up to 5 copies of this item.
